items.sentence: Since Tom couldn\'t make a decent living as a nightclub musician, he had to get a day job.
Tom looked hot and tired, so I offered him a cold drink and told him to sit down and rest.
Tom can\'t help wondering whether he would have been better off if he had gone to college.
That man asked me who I was, but I didn\'t think it was necessary to answer that question.
I told Tom the reason I didn\'t want to do it was that I didn\'t think it was a good idea.
